title: The Everything Guide to Chakra Healing: Use your body's subtle energies to promote health, healing, and happiness
description: When your chakras are in balance, you feel safe, creative, strong, and secure in yourself and in your relationships. However, at times in your life, your chakras can lose their equilibrium. If you can learn to balance your chakras, you will enjoy better health, increased contentment, and a stronger awareness of your life's true purpose.This easy-to-grasp guide teaches you how your chakras function and provides simple techniques and meditations to keep them active and healthy. Inside you'll This guide helps you take charge of your mental and physical well being and develop the skills to create the life you desire.
author: Heidi Spear
